title: Looking for team.
body:
Level: 29 
Pref role: Adc/Mid/Top (in that order)
Age: 20

I am almost level 30, and want a team/duo that's dedicated to become challenger. I must admit im a average skilled player, but with the willingness to improve, a love for the game and the work ethic of a beast, it wont take me long to become a competitive (not saying Pro) LoL player.

i want to join a smart, reliable, headstraight team/duo who aims for the same goal i am, to become unbeatable ;D

Add me in game and msg me.
-TheChadMizer

replies.body: hi there putting togeather a team of golds and silvers wanting to get ranked team as high as poss we need a adc and sup as other roles have been filled training once a week and team games on sunday if your interested i added you so message me
